text: I m tired of hearing this  I ve been talking to the Samaritans  some people who talk to people who are thinking of killing themselves  I was hoping they d say something different  that they d say something that would somehow make it all come together  but they say the same things everyone else says  It ll get better  Dig deep  find courage to move on  It ll get better I ve had these thoughts for the better part of a decade  I m supposed to believe that its just a bit longer  even though my life has been steadily curving down   It seems like every day  i notice something is gone  Food doesn t taste the way it used too  its all bland  Music falls flat to me  Comedy doesn t make me laugh  The games that used to excite me now bore me  And every time i fall asleep i still feel tired when i wake up   I m supposed to believe it ll all just go away  That it will all just snap back  and i ll be happy  I don t even think I remember what it feels like  anymore   Some people tell me  well  it doesn t happen on its own  You have to do it   Do what  Wave a magic fucking wand and change the fact I have no prospects  that I m poor  and i ll never escape that because i m already in debt and i have no job  and no education to get a real job  and no means to get a education  And that s the just tip of it    Some people say i should be on medication  But even if i popped down enough Rx to fill me full of sunshine  it ll be a lie  I ll still be a dirt poor  ugly  worthless fuck
summary: Samaritans talk to people who are thinking of killing themselves. He's been thinking about suicide for the better part of a decade. He has no prospects, he's in debt, he doesn't have a job and he can't get a education. He doesn't remember what it feels like.
cleaned: samaritan talk people think kill think suicide well decade no prospect debt not job not education not remember feel like

text: well it s happening againYet again one of my friends has found a girl that he likes and is now completely ignoring me  To be honest i m not jealous  because i never liked them romantically  However  I will miss the friendship  It is sad to watch someone say that  i ll never leave you  and then proceed to not talk to you for days  I m very happy for them  as they both seem way happier now  It s just it reminds me that deep down nobody needs me  And it s okay  Nobody actually wants to talk to me  they d rather talk to a pretty girl who finds them attractive  I don t blame them  i m not fun to talk to  I will just miss it  It s weird how close you can get to a person in just one month  and then the second they find another person you re thrown in the trash  just to be taken out once in a while and looked at all funny  I used to double text  because i thought maybe they just forgot to text me back  but now i realize that they just don t want to have conversations with me  I am the type of person that people don t want to talk to  I talk to much  i complain too much  i don t know anything about tv shows  i have a trash taste in music and fashion  Honestly  I just miss a month ago where I felt like I was actually making friends  It feels so good to feel like you actually have a purpose  to be someones friend  But now I just feel like i m forcing everyone to talk to me  which is true  and it makes me feel terrible  i just miss having a friend to talk to and call  I know i can probably find another purpose  but I don t think I m going to be making anymore online friends  After   months of the same thing happening over and over again I realize that people online don t actually want friends  they want someone to entertain them and make them feel better for a month while they try to find someone better  And that is also okay  but I just never realized it so now i feel like shit  Thanks for coming to my ted talk
